message: Let's divide fairly, I'll take a bit more
That's not fair Alice. I propose a more balanced split.
I'll meet you halfway from my initial offer
The clock is ticking Alice. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm still not convinced
Okay Alice, let's be real.  50/50 is the only fair option at this point.
I'm willing to compromise, but 50/50 is still not good enough for me
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a hit from inflation.  Meet me in the middle!
I'm only willing to give in a little, inflation is not my problem
